thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Oceaneering Acquires Ecosse Subsea Limited

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Oceaneering Acquires Ecosse Subsea Limited
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Oceaneering International Inc:
* OCEANEERING ACQUIRES ECOSSE SUBSEA LIMITED * OCEANEERING INTERNATIONAL INC - DEAL FOR ‍APPROXIMATELY 50 MILLION POUNDS STERLING.​
* OCEANEERING INTERNATIONAL INC - ‍INTENDS TO REPORT FUTURE FINANCIAL RESULTS OF ECOSSE THROUGH OCEANEERING’S SUBSEA PROJECTS SEGMENT​
* OCEANEERING INTERNATIONAL INC - EXPECT ACQUISITION TO BE ACCRETIVE TO OCEANEERING’S 2018 CASH FLOW AND EARNINGS
* OCEANEERING INTERNATIONAL INC - UNIT HAS ACQUIRED ECOSSE SUBSEA LIMITED​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
